name: Deathmatch at Castle Grayscale!
description:
"Color Changes Change Everything"

Made for the Harvest Game Jam! Theme was "Color Changes Everything".

Rushed out by one person in 24 hours (with the help of a lot of free assets). I'll add credits and a better description later.

Story(?):

You (and many other colorful dev capsules) have been pitted against one another in a battle to the death for some reason.

Unfortunately, ammo is simply not available, and health will have to be found (or made) on the spot.

Luckily for you, you can swap stats for a free pool of some other ammo instead! Don't mess up!

Stats (by name):

"Heal" <- Your health. Don't let that empty out or you're dead. Also, might not want to swap something that's empty into that either.

"Ammo" <- Your current ammunition. Different ammunition has interesting effects, with OP ones (and duds). Be careful what you swap for!

"Stam" <- Your stamina. The only stat that recharges as long as you don't run.

"Side" <- Your side pool. Would have been like a secondary weapon, but well... 24 hour game jam.

Stats (by color!):
Red Heart <- Normally health, but will spawn a medkit if you shoot with it.

Yellow Bullet <- Normal ammo, for normal FPS needs normally.

Purple Shuriken <- A sophisticated throwing star. Stronger, but slightly slower.

Blue Lightning <- The overpowered lightning bolt. Strikes most enemies dead instantly. Pray your opponents don't get it.

Stat swapping:

The only pickup that spawns naturally in the arena is the "stat swapper". It will swap two stats instantly, both in the player (and in the ammo pool of opponents). Be careful how you use it!
